I love that this is not smocked across the entire chest area. It does fit just a little weird between the first tier and the ruffle of the bottom tier. The ruffles around the arm are nice and there isn’t a gap under the arm which I often end up with. I think it runs true to size. I tend to be between a small and a medium and the small fits great!
This dress was super comfy and fit well. It was loose and I loved the color and pockets in the dress. I wore it in summer and it was the perfect material.

If you're into a more modest high cut on your dresses, this is the dress for you. I like it but I felt like the top was a little too high on my chest. I'd recommend this dress as a nice Sunday / church dress. Oh! And - it has pockets! A win.

A little tight around the bust but otherwise a nice dress

评论概述: Love the sewn in slip, might need to size up
评论详情: I ordered this in the sky blue and size medium. I'm in between a medium and a large but usually wear a medium if a dress is a flowy style. Because of that, I went with a medium in this. It fits but it's a little snug. I think the large would fit me much better. If you're in-between sizes, I would recommend sizing up. The dress itself is cute. The color looks just like the product photo, it seems well-made, and I love that there is a slip built in. So many dresses these days are practically see-through with no slip. This dress looks fine as it is but I think adding a belt really upgrades it. Cute for spring and summer!

Thin material but not too see through. I’m 5’10 and a 14/16 and the XL fit, but it fit well and not loose like the photos. The dress just looked silly with the sleeveless look when they’re pulled up on your shoulders but if you pull it down for the off the shoulder look, it’s much cuter.  Simple and thin, but cute for a hot day out

Distress is beautiful as far as the color in the material. The only thing that I have to say is that I would prefer it to cinch the waist with the belt, and I think that would make it perfect. Hence why I gave it four out of five stars. There is no stretch to the material.

This dress did not fit me at all like the picture. It is snug across the bust and there is no way I would be able to wear it off shoulder. I wore it for Easter with a white denim jacket over it, which made the tightness across the bust less noticeable, but then you couldn’t see the cute ruffled shoulders. I’m afraid if it shrinks at all in the wash that I won’t be able to wear it at all.  The material is also obviously polyester which makes it look kind of cheap. And it’s a good thing it’s lined or it would be see through.  Unless you are small busted, I would skip this one.

This is a really cute dress for summer wear and especially for vacation. The green is a vibrant Kelley green and looks great and is light and airy. The sleeves can be worn on or off the shoulder. I'm pretty short and the large hit just above my ankles. The top chest portion is a little large and could use a bit more definition. Also, while this dress looks very wide in the picture it actually fits true to size so it's not as wide as it appears.

The Spring Summer Square Collar Dress with an Off-Shoulder Style and Elegant Ruffle Hem is a stunning and versatile piece for any occasion. The square collar adds a touch of sophistication, while the off-shoulder design exudes a hint of allure. The elegant ruffle hemline adds movement and flair to the dress, creating a feminine and stylish silhouette. Made with lightweight and breathable fabric, this dress is perfect for spring and summer events, offering both comfort and style. Overall, it's a chic and timeless choice that can be dressed up or down for various occasions.
Nice dress very comfortable and true to size

I’m impressed with the quality of this dress. Pros: It has double layer on the skirt area which means it is not see-through. Shoulder has rubber lining all around so when you do off the shoulder look, it sticks where you want it to be rather than sliding down. Color is vibrant. It doesn’t wrinkle easily. Con: The rubber shoulder lining leaves red mark all around where it sits so it’s kind of tacky.
This dress is very well made. It feels boho-chic. It is a very classic and fun dress to wear for brunch on a spring or summer afternoon
This is really a cute dress for summer.  It has a nice fabric and designed to fit with a good shape.  It looks up to date and not old school.

This dress seems very light and is cute. It should be great in the summer but for now its too cold here. Cant wait to take it on our cruise this summer. I haven't washed it yet but it seems sturdy enough it won't get ruined in the wash!
This is a great dress for the money.  It has a slip sewn in which is a plus.  It runs a little small.  I’m usually a large and I had to exchange it for a X-Large.  The X-large  fit great.
Beautiful dress. Off Shoulder Style with an Elegant Ruffle at the bottom. Fits wonderfully. I love the bright green color. Makes a great gift. I highly recommend.

Dokotoo Women's 2024 Spring Summer Square Collar Dress Off Shoulder Style Elegant Ruffle Hemline Skirt Mini Dresses S-XL.  There were no loose threads or crooked seams. The fabrication is a quintessential summer fabric. Lightweight, airy and comfortable. I’d say this is true to size. I am an XS with broad shoulders. I unfortunately listened to the myriad of reviews saying size up and I should not have. Small would have been perfect. It has no stretch in the fabric. The areas sewn with elastic will stretch.  The color is deeply saturated. This is a very feminine and flirty dress. The flounce sleeveless sleeves are perfect. You can wear the sleeves on your shoulders or pulled down. I love the pockets. I fixed the issue of it being to large with a simple blazer clip. The clips that you add to the back of a blazer to cinch it in when it’s too large. I was able to fit it to my body perfectly and it looks great.  This is a great dress if it’s for your body type. I am 5’6.5” 108 pounds 34”x26”x36” broad shoulders, long legs & ’m a very full B cup (used to be a C) Hoping this helps others.

I chose this adorable orange dress for my spring wardrobe, specifically with Easter in mind. The fresh light orange was a unique shade that i thought would transition well between seasons. The tiered dress and flutter sleeves are typically a flattering silhouette for my shape, and the smocked neckline makes this a versatile dress that can also be worn off shoulder (one of my favorite styles). The dress is just as gorgeous in person as in the listing, the color is accurately depicted while the fabric is both breathable and comfortable. However, the dress didn't seem to lay naturally across my larger bust. It would cause awkward creasing at the top of the garment and then tent out below my bust, giving it a slightly frumpy look and also an unflattering silhouette for my body type (as shown in pictures). By belting it below my bust, it smoothed it out and showcased my figure better- transforming it into a dress i feel super confident and comfortable in. If you’re small to average chested, i feel like the dress would lay nicely on your figure and a belt wouldn’t be necessary for this to be a showstopping dress. However, if you’re built more like me (40 DD and size 12/14), i would suggest finding a cute thin belt to pair it with. The dress quality is great, and its seams/fabric help to keep the belt secure without belt loops. It’s definitely worth it to accessorize and I would recommend this feminine flutter-sleeve dress for any special event- or even pair it with casual sneakers and a hat for a warm day. I’m so pleased with this timeless beauty and can’t wait to showcase it this Spring. 🧡

This dress is adorable! It’s perfect for casual beach days. The off-shoulder style and ruffle hemline add a touch of fun. The square collar gives it a unique flair, and the purple color is lovely. It's comfortable yet stylish, making it my new favorite beach dress. A must-have for any Bubbe's summer wardrobe!

评论概述: A Great Choice for Warm Weather Dressy Casual!
评论详情: This dress is really great for vacation or warm weather occasions!  I really like its vibrant green color with ruffle sleeves and flowing skirt.  The smocked top has a lot of elasticity, so my 47" bust was fine fitting in the XL (shown as 41.73" on the size chart).  The fit was accurate for the waist and there is a room for movement if you are a little past the maximum measurement.  It does fit closer to the body rather than the exaggerated version shown on the seller's page.  This dress also has pockets, but I wish it didn't...I like "cleaner lines," especially as I don't put things in pockets. That's my only constructive criticism.  The fabric is lightweight and airy, feels pleasant against the skin, and isn't see through (especially given the lining); the material's texture adds a nice design touch.
Love the design of this dress, it’s very simple but can be dressed up. Fabric is light and airy. The light green is a beautiful color. I would recommend sizing up a size if you have a larger bust.

I recently got the Dokotoo Women’s 2024 Spring Summer Square Collar Dress. Unfortunately, the dress didn’t fit me well, even though I ordered my usual size, small. The style on the top seems to be designed for someone very thin and flat. If you don’t fit this specific body type, it might not work for you. However, on a positive note, I absolutely loved the sky blue color and the material felt nice to the touch. It’s a shame that the fit wasn’t right for me.”
Horrible fit, cheap polyester material, unflattering, just not at all what it looks like in the product photos.
Love the fit. Bought in Green and black. True to size
I had no idea this dress had pockets when I ordered it… But it does and I’m so excited! The material is nice and the fit is great! I’m 5’6 and it hits high ankle on me.

评论概述: Not as big as it looks.
评论详情: I originally thought that this dress was going to be bigger as it shows that in the imaging…however when I received it, I would say that it’s not that big but is true to sizes as in small medium and large. I think this dress is sown well, it’s very comfortable, flowy and will be perfect for summer and maybe even springtime depending upon where you live! Over all I am happy with dress and definitely would recommend!!!

I ordered a size down from my normal (XL to L) thinking this style of sundress is usually really flowy and oversized. Nope. While this looks exactly like the photo in style, color, & length the fit/sizing is not right. It fit like a tight bodycon mermaid dress making me think even someone who is a medium or small might consider doubling up to get that breezy look instead of a fit & flare. It fit around my wider than average shoulders and C sized bust. The seams have ZERO give so after getting the stretch part over my chest, I had to shimmy the rest down only to realize I then couldn't really move or walk. I like the breathable crepe material, the fluffy sleeve, and love the blue green color but I'd need at least a 3XL to look as effortless as the model. But she does have pockets!

This dress is soooo pretty, I am not being dramatic or anything here. I absolutely love it. I love the color and the fit. The pattern is so cute and summery too (it’s pink but there’s a bit of white woven throughout). This dress will go perfect with my khaki wedges
